content.question:
Write the  findWinner  method, which simulates a race between two cars consisting of  numLaps  laps around a racetrack. Each car takes a different amount of time to complete each lap, which can be found using the  getLapTime  method in the  RaceCar  class. For example, calling  getLapTime(3)  on a  RaceCar  object will return the number of seconds it takes the car to complete lap 3 of the race.

The  findWinner  method returns a  String  indicating the outcome of the race, according to the following rules.

"Car 1 wins!"  is returned if  carOne  completes the race in fewer seconds than  carTwo.

"Car 2 wins!"  is returned if  carTwo  completes the race in fewer seconds than  carOne.

"Tie!"  is returned if the cars complete the race in the same amount of time.

Complete method  findWinner.  You must use  getLapTime  appropriately in order to receive full credit.
 /**
 * Simulates a race with numLaps laps and returns a String
 * indicating the outcome, as described in part (a)
 * Precondition: numLaps > 0
 */
public String findWinner(int numLaps)
